columns.name: DeviceId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the device in the service

columns.name: SoftwareVersion
columns.description: Version number of the software product

columns.name: RegistryPaths
columns.description: Registry paths where evidence indicating the existence of the software on a device was detected

columns.name: DiskPaths
columns.description: Disk paths where file-level evidence indicating the existence of the software on a device was detected

columns.name: LastSeenTime
columns.description: Date and time when the device was last seen by this service
